title: Stark wins the U.S. Women's Open for first major
description: Maja Stark continued the steady play she had demonstrated all week to win the U.S. Women's Open and claim her first major championship Sunday at Erin Hills.

title: Wright St. ousts No. 1 overall Vandy from regional
description: Wright State held off Vanderbilt in the ninth to knock out the No. 1 national seed from the NCAA tournament with a 5-4 victory in the Nashville Regional on Sunday.

title: Verstappen 'let himself down' with Russell collision
description: George Russell says Max Verstappen "let himself down" with an incident in which the Dutchman appeared to deliberately drive into his Mercedes in Spain.

title: Root 'getting better with age' - the numbers behind his ODI brilliance
description: Joe Root is now England's leading run-scorer in one-day internationals - what are the numbers behind his brilliance?

title: Christopher Bell hits wall after getting hit by Erik Jones at NASCAR Nashville race
description: Christopher Bell was spun out by Erik Jones in the NASCAR Nashville race on June 1

title: Who's in super regionals? Updated bracket, schedule for NCAA baseball tournament
description: The super regionals of the NCAA baseball tournament are taking shape with the regionals wrapping up on Sunday and Monday.

title: Piastri beats Norris to pole as McLaren seal front-row lockout in Spain
description: Oscar Piastri beat team-mate Lando Norris to pole position for the Spanish Grand Prix as McLaren sealed a front-row lockout.

title: Russell: Verstappen contact 'felt deliberate' | Max: Does it matter?
description: George Russell says Max Verstappen's contact with him at the Spanish Grand Prix "felt deliberate" and called the move "totally unnecessary".
